title: Course of Biostatistics
text:
Program

Descriptive statistics: frequency distribution, measures of location and variability, graphical representations
Introduction to inferential statistics
Introduction to suvival analysis



(Tentative) Schedule
The lessons will be held via Google Meet sessions according to the following schedule:

Tuesday, April 2, 15.30-18.00
Monday, April 8, 15.30-18.00
Monday, April 15, 15.30-18.00
Wednesday, April 17, 15.30-18.00 (cancelled)
Monday, April 22, 15.30-18.00
Tuesday, April 30, 15.30-18.00
Monday, May 6, 15.30-18.00
Wednesday, May 8 15.30-18.00



Materials
Data data for tutorials excel; csv;
Lecture 1.1: introduction: Tuesday, April 2
Lecture 1.2: frequency distributions: Tuesday, April 2
Lecture 1.3: graphical reprentations: Tuesday, April 2
Tutorial 1 Tutorial 1: text
Lecture 2: measures of location: Monday, April 8
Tutorial 2 Tutorial 2: text
Lecture 3.1: measures of variability and measures of the shape of the frequency distribution: Monday, April 15
Tutorial 3 Tutorial 3: text
Lecture 3.2: bivariate data analysis (part 1): Monday, April 15
Tutorial 4 Tutorial 4: text
Lecture 4: bivariate data analysis (part 2). (A gentle) Introduction to probability theory: Monday, April 22
Tutorial 5 Descriptive Statistics with R
Lecture 5: Statistical tests, Part 1: Tuesday, April 30
Lecture 6: Statistical tests, Part 2: Monday, May 6
Lecture 7: Introduction to survival analysis: Wednesday, May 8
